marklogic.body: yank all his teeth out with a rusty pair of pliers, Burn Off his eyebrows with a cuban cigar, break his fingers and toes one by one, lubricate a baseball bat with habanero pepper juice and shove it up his ass,stone him with bricks, make him drink a bleach & pepper spray smoothie, lay him in a bed of fire ants with honey all over his body, and THEN let Trayvon's father put one in HIS chest!!!!
